[b][color=white]Contracts Required for all Deals[/color][/b]
[url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1][b][color=#9999FF]Omniscient[/color][/b][/url] has implemented a new rule. From March 1st, all deals are to be done through Hack Forums Contracts. Anyone caught doing transactions without contracts can face actions. [i][size=x-small][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5935709]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]Scratch Cards v2[/color][/b]
In addition to Bytes, now you can purchase the Scratch Cards through Coin Payments (BTC, XMR, ETH, LTC, BCH, DASH) as well. Go ahead and try your fate. [i][size=x-small][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5936276]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]The Game Beta[/color][/b]
A new Hacking related game is on its way. Check out the roadmap in a dedicated thread. [i][size=x-small][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5937740]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]110k Closed Accounts Pruned[/color][/b]
All the accounts have been closed which were 7+ years old. [i][size=x-small][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5937887]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[align=center][url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1034038][img]https://hackforums.news/assets/v4/sciencenews-saltpeter.png[/img][/url][/align]
[font=Trebuchet MS][size=medium]

[b][color=white]Crusing Self-Driving Cars Saving Money[/color][/b] 
Due to the exorbitant prices being charged to park in cities, many self-driving cars have begun "cruising" instead. While this may sound like an amazing idea at first glance, a deeper dive is necessary. With electric, and subsequently self-driving, cars becoming more and more common this is predicted to heavily contribute to traffic in especially high-density areas. It may even give a whole new meaning to the phrase "gridlock." According to transportation planner Adam Millard-Ball, an associate professor of environmental studies at the University of California, Santa Cruz, "Parking prices are what get people out of their cars and on to public transit, but autonomous vehicles have no need to park at all. They can get around paying for parking by cruising," he said. "They will have every incentive to create havoc." [i][size=x-small][url=https://news.ucsc.edu/2019/01/millardball-vehicles.html]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]Healthier Activity Begets a Healthier Diet[/color][/b] 
A study from the University of Texas found that those who willfully engaged in exercise soon found themselves craving a healthier diet. They first found a sample of 2,680 young adults who were not exercising regularly or dieting. Those involved with this study were only instructed to start exercising regularly, these changes in their diet were just a pleasant side effect. Many of the participants also reported feeling much better after retiring their more sedentary ways, however, this is less surprising and is fairly well documented previously, [i][size=x-small][url=https://news.utexas.edu/2019/01/30/want-healthier-eating-habits-start-with-a-workout/]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

       
[/size][/font]
[align=center][url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=3601559][img]https://www.hackforums.news/assets/v4/animenews-nightmare.png[/img][/url][/align]
[font=Trebuchet MS][size=medium]

[b][color=white]Yu-Gi-Oh! Legacy of the Duelist Game to be Released on Nintendo Switch[/color][/b]
This past monday it was revealed by the official website for the Yu-Gi-Oh! Card game that the franchise will be getting a Nintendo Switch Game named "Yu-Gi-Oh! Legacy of the Duelist - Link Evolution." Currently, they haven't given a Release Date, but they've stated that the next issue of Shueisha's V Jump Magazine will have Information regarding the game when it releases on February 21. The game was previously released for Xbox One, and the Playstation 4 in July of 2015. It was released on PC via Steam as well in December of 2016.  [i][size=x-small][url=https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/news/2019-02-04/yu-gi-oh-legacy-of-the-duelist-link-evolution-switch-game-revealed/.142968]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]Crunchyroll Adds Pastel Memories, How Clumpsy you are, Miss Ueno. and BanG Dream! Season 2[/color][/b]
Crunchroll announced this past Sunday that they've added "Pastel Memories", "How Clumsy you are", "Miss Ueno", and "BanG Dream! Season 2" to its winter simulcast lineup. The first four episodes of Pastel Memories will release on Monday, 12:30 p.m. EST in the United States, Canada, United Kingdom, Ireland, Australia, New Zealand, South Africa, the Netherlands, Scandinavia, Central and South America, Spain, and Portugal. New episodes will premier the following Mondays. The First few Episodes of "How Clumsy you are, Miss Ueno." are available now worthlwide excluding Asia. New episodes will premier the following Sundays. The first five episodes of "Bang Dream!" season 2 are labeled as "Coming Soon" on Crunchyroll, and new episodes will premier the following Thursdays. [i][size=x-small][url=https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/news/2019-02-04/crunchyroll-adds-pastel-memories-bang-dream-season-2-how-clumsy-you-are-miss-ueno-anime/.142956]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]Crowfunding for Kurayukaba Anime Ends with 276% of its Goal Reached[/color][/b]
The Crowfunding for Shigeyoshi Tsukahara and Twiflo's original anime project Kurayukaba ended successfully this last Wednesday, they raised 6,901,864 yen which is about $63,000, from 397 backers. 276% of its 2,500,000 yen goal, which is about $22,100. This campaign had the goal of creating a 30-second video, but due to the success of their Campaign they're now able to create a one-minute video. 

Twiflo described the anime: "Our story is set beneath the surface of the great metropolis, below the district of Ogi-town in a realm of dreams that floats in a haze of purple lignite smoke. A network of roads stretches away underground, concealing bandits at every turn! An armored train snakes through the looming darkness: the steel-clad train Sokore 463 is equipped with a 75mm mountain gun that can blow a target to smithereens! In command is the mysterious girl Tanne. What awaits her and her comrades? From the winding alleys of Akegata (dawn) to the deep subterranean world of Kuragari (dark), a daring adventure unfolds!"[i][size=x-small][url=https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/news/2019-02-04/kurayukaba-anime-crowdfunding-ends-with-276-percent-of-goal-reached/.142949]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

   [/size][/font]

[align=center][img]https://www.hackforums.news/assets/v4/3.png[/img][/align]


        

[align=center][url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1705027][img]https://hackforums.news/assets/v4/darkops-business.png[/img][/url][/align]


[align=center][color=#95a7c4][size=small]TOPIC:[/size] [i][size=large]Did you play Scratch Cards on the day they were released? If so, how many Bytes did you earn before they were reset?[/size][/i][/color][/align]
[font=Trebuchet MS][size=medium]

[size=medium][color=#ffffff]"About 118,000 I believe. I was a bit late to the party."[/color][/size]
~[i][color=#888888][url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=659087][color=#95a7c4]Kill Joy[/color][/url][/color][/i]

[size=medium][color=#ffffff]"I had the most bytes on the forum. 4.2m into crypto game."[/color][/size]
~[i][color=#888888]Anonymous[/color][/i]

[size=medium][color=#ffffff]"I think I made upwards of 400k before the reset. I did play."[/color][/size]
~[i][color=#888888][url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=3396409][color=#95a7c4]Oblivion[/color][/url][/color][/i]

[/size][/font]
[align=center][color=#95a7c4][size=small]TOPIC:[/size] [i][size=large]If you could only post on Hack Forums one more time, what would you say?[/size][/i][/color][/align]
[font=Trebuchet MS][size=medium]

[size=medium][color=#ffffff]"To Lavish Living: Your mother was a hamster, and your father smelt of elderberries!"[/color][/size]
~[i][color=#888888][url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=659087][color=#95a7c4]Kill Joy[/color][/url][/color][/i]

[size=medium][color=#ffffff]"I'd drop all the info I have gathered in a single post."[/color][/size]
~[i][color=#888888]Anonymous[/color][/i]

[size=medium][color=#ffffff]"I would say, its been fun."[/color][/size]
~[i][color=#888888][url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=3396409][color=#95a7c4]Oblivion[/color][/url][/color][/i]      

[/size][/font]
[align=center][color=#95a7c4][size=small]TOPIC:[/size] [i][size=large]Would you say high quality threads are more or less frequent lately? Why do you think this is?[/size][/i][/color][/align]
[font=Trebuchet MS][size=medium]

[size=medium][color=#ffffff]"Depends on where you look I guess. If you’re in the Lounge most of the time, of course they won’t be HQ. I think specific sections Like photography have good tutorials but more are always welcome."[/color][/size]
~[i][color=#888888][url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=659087][color=#95a7c4]Kill Joy[/color][/url][/color][/i]

[size=medium][color=#ffffff]"Not frequent at all. No motivation."[/color][/size]
~[i][color=#888888]Anonymous[/color][/i]

[size=medium][color=#ffffff]"About the same."[/color][/size]
~[i][color=#888888][url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=3396409][color=#95a7c4]Oblivion[/color][/url][/color][/i]
      
[/size][/font]
[align=center][color=#888888][i][size=x-large]Let us know what your opinion is, uncensored. [url=https://hfnt.typeform.com/to/dHd2NV]Begin here.[/url][/size][/i][/color][/align]
